channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
item.description: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.

item.title: How to Use Physics to Escape an Ice Bowl
item.description: Here are three smart tricks, based on an understanding of frictional forces, to beat a slippery slope.

item.title: Amazon’s ‘Melania’ documentary makes $7M on opening weekend
item.description: While the documentary is exceeding box office expectations, it's unlikely to make a profit in theaters.

item.title: Building a Watch Collection on a Budget? Here’s Where to Start (2026)
item.description: Yes, it is possible to scale horological heights without breaking the bank. It’s time to seek out the latest bargains.

item.title: AI layoffs or ‘AI-washing’?
item.description: How many of the companies with recent layoffs are just using AI as an excuse?

item.title: Best Valentine’s Day Gifts (2026): Legos, Karaoke, Digital Frames, and More
item.description: The holiday of romance is just around the corner. Don’t give something boring.

item.title: Indonesia ‘conditionally’ lifts ban on Grok
item.description: Indonesia has followed Malaysia and the Philippines in lifting a ban on xAI’s chatbot Grok.

item.title: 7 Best Prepaid Phone Plans (2026)
item.description: Forget the pricey, postpaid cell plans and two-year contracts. Save with one of these WIRED-tested options from US Mobile, Boost, and Google Fi.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: The great Tesla rebranding
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: The Best Date-Night Boxes of 2026, Tested With My Hinge Dates
item.description: I tested 10 popular date-night boxes with people I met on Hinge. From writing love notes to trying out sex swings, these kits fulfilled their promise ...
